synopsis.text: Even with diverse professional backgrounds, a group of aspiring male idols unite under the banner of 315 Production, a fledgling talent agency. From ex-lawyers to former doctors and pilots, these men share a singular dream: to rise to the top of the idol world. Their unique journeys unfold in "THE iDOLM@STER: SideM" franchise, which has expanded to include a game, live performances, comics, and a short anime featuring all 46 idols in adorable, chibi form. Based on Sumeragi's official spin-off manga, "The Idom@ster SideM Wake Atte Mini!" TV anime adaptation premiered on Tokyo MX and BS 11 on October 9, 2018, offering a delightful dose of entertainment and inspiration.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
